rooms.description: A spacious open-plan living area combining seating and dining areas with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light.
Modern kitchenette integrated with the living area, adhering to Vastu principles with an east or north-east orientation.
A dedicated private gym area equipped with modern fitness equipment, utilizing high ceilings and natural lighting.
Modern master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, ample storage, and integrated en-suite bathroom ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door at the north side, ensuring Vastu compliance by placing it in the north or east direction.
Secondary exit door leading to the private gym and outdoor area, following natural flow of space.

additional_features: Floor-to-ceiling windows throughout to maximize natural light
Modern finishes and materials with a focus on sustainability
Open layout design emphasizing fluid movement between living spaces
Private gym integrated into the ground floor for convenience
